scripts.lint: eslint --fix lib/*.js lib/**/*.js lib/**/**/*.js && npm run lint-2560 && npm run lint-5280
scripts.test: mocha --reporter spec test/*-test.js && cd rfc/2560 && npm i && npm test && cd ../../rfc/5280 && npm i && npm test && cd ../../ && npm run lint
